tweets.text: I am building a thing right now with some friends, I'm not sure exactly what it is, let alone a name for it, but in order for me to gather tools around it, I am constantly bombarded by requests for names- what to name the folder? the GH repo? the discord channel?

computers almost always ask you to name things at the time of creation- that is not how names are given, names are usually given after a period of assessment and discussion, at the end of the process, such that the name captures the essence of the thing

@mattdunnam I think trying to make CMSes that try to scale is part of the problem - CMS monoculture breeds content monoculture. Open source software has the same problem. Instagram Stories is the best user facing CMS we have in 2019 imo.
